groups.name: spring.python.aspect.async
groups.description: Configuration properties for asynchronous execution of Python aspects.

properties.name: spring.python.aspect.async.enabled
properties.description: Whether asynchronous aspect execution is enabled.

properties.name: spring.python.aspect.async.scopes
properties.description: Defines when asynchronous execution should be applied (before or after method execution).

properties.name: spring.python.aspect.async.core-pool-size
properties.description: Core number of threads to keep in the async thread pool.

properties.name: spring.python.aspect.async.max-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum number of threads allowed in the async thread pool.

properties.name: spring.python.aspect.async.queue-capacity
properties.description: Capacity of the task queue used by the async executor.

properties.name: spring.python.aspect.async.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: Prefix to use for async executor thread names.

properties.name: spring.python.aspect.async.rejection-policy
properties.description: Policy used when the async executor queue is full and a new task cannot be accepted.

values.description: Run asynchronously before the method execution.
Run asynchronously after the method execution.
The calling thread runs the task when the queue is full.
Rejects the task and throws a RejectedExecutionException.
Silently discards the task when the queue is full.
Discards the oldest task in the queue and retries submission.
